Module org.enstabretagne.invaders
Package org.enstabretagne.invaders.components

Class AlienBlock

java.lang.Object
org.enstabretagne.invaders.components.AlienBlock
public class AlienBlock extends Object
A rectangular block of aliens, bound together for coherent movement.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AlienBlock(int numberRow, int alienPerRow, Directions orientation)
    Builds a rectangular block of aliens, from left to right then in the direction of facing.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlienBlock

      public AlienBlock(int numberRow, int alienPerRow, Directions orientation)
      Builds a rectangular block of aliens, from left to right then in the direction of facing.
      Parameters:
      numberRow - Number of rows in the block.
      alienPerRow - Number of aliens per rows.
      orientation - Direction of movement of the block. Must be Directions.UP or Directions.DOWN.

  • Method Details

    • addAlien

      public void addAlien(int id, com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity alien)
      Add an alien entity to the block. Aliens are identified by a unique id in a block, to allow differentiation between them.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the alien.
      alien - The alien entity.

    • removeAlien

      public void removeAlien(com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity alien)
      Remove alien from the block, and remove it from the game world.
      Parameters:
      alien - The alien entity to remove.

    • move

      public void move()
      Move the block. If at the left or right bound, the block will move up/down according to AlienBock#facing and change direction. If the bottom or top bounds are reached, game-over. Update bounds after moving.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Move the block left by individually moving each alien.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Move the block right by individually moving each alien.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move the block down by individually moving each alien.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move the block up by individually moving each alien.

    • maybeBlast

      public void maybeBlast()
      Find aliens who can shoot. Then randomly make them shoot. Only aliens in an extreme line (if facing DOWN, then only the bottom aliens can shoot). ex of search pattern for block facing down : 2 4 and if only 2 4 remain, then 1 and 4 might shoot. 1 3 1 .
